languages.text: "Мой мир похож на бесконечную дорогу, пронизывающую саму галактику. Я не вижу ее начала, не вижу конца..." {n}Ирлиэт замирает и внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Но вижу конец этого пути для тебя, {name}. Он обрывается раньше моего — как мимолетная вспышка, сияние падающей звезды. Краткое, прекрасное мгновение... И этот путь, это мгновение я желаю пройти вместе с тобой. Не как человек и дитя Азуриана — на равных. {name} и Ирлиэт. Ирлиэт и {name}. Что скажешь?"

"My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see no beginning or end to it..." {n}Yrliet pauses and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"
languages.original_text: "Мой мир похож на бесконечную дорогу, пронизывающую саму галактику. Я не вижу ее начала, не вижу конца..." {n}Ирлиэт замирает и внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Но вижу конец этого пути для тебя, {name}. Он обрывается раньше моего — как мимолетная вспышка, сияние падающей звезды. Краткое, прекрасное мгновение... И этот путь, это мгновение я желаю пройти вместе с тобой. Не как человек и дитя Азуриана — на равных. {name} и Ирлиэт. Ирлиэт и {name}. Что скажешь?"

traits.locale_text: "My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see neither the beginning nor the end of it..." {n}Yrliet freezes and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where this road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the shine of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to live alongside you. For as long as the stars will let me. Not as a human and a child of Asuryan — as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see neither the beginning nor the end of it..." {n}Yrliet freezes and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where this road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the shine of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to live alongside you. For as long as the stars will let me. Not as a human and a child of Asuryan — as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"

It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我的世界就像一条横越星系的道路，永远看不到尽头，既没有起点，也没有终点……”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿，目不转睛地看着你。{/n}“可我能看到你的道路的尽头，{name}。那条路比我的路要短，像稍纵即逝的闪电，像星辰陨落的辉光，美妙而短暂的一瞬间……可我想与你一同踏上这段旅程，共度这段旅途。不是以人类与阿苏焉之子的身份，而是作为平等的伴侣——{name}和伊莉耶特，伊莉耶特和{name}。你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see no beginning or end to it..." {n}Yrliet pauses and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"

traits.locale_text: “我的世界就像一条横越星系的道路，永远看不到尽头，既没有起点，也没有终点……”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿，目不转睛地看着你。{/n}“可我能看到你的道路的尽头，{name}。那条路比我的路要短，像稍纵即逝的闪电，像星辰陨落的辉光，美妙而短暂的一瞬间……可我想与你一同踏上这段旅程，共度这段旅途。愿群星见证，不是以人类与阿苏焉之子的身份，而是作为平等的伴侣——{name}和伊莉耶特，伊莉耶特和{name}。你说呢？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Mi mundo se parece a un camino interminable que atraviesa la galaxia misma. No veo en él un principio ni un final...». {n}Yrliet hace una pausa para mirarte con atención.{/n} «Pero sí diviso dónde termina el camino para ti, {name}. Y termina mucho antes que el mío; es como un destello fugaz, el centelleo de una estrella distante. Un momento breve y hermoso... Y este camino, este momento, deseo compartirlo contigo. Y no como {mf|un humano|una humana} y una hija de Asuryan, sino como iguales. {name} e Yrliet. Yrliet y {name}. ¿Qué me dices?».
languages.original_text: "My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see no beginning or end to it..." {n}Yrliet pauses and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"

traits.locale_text: «Mi mundo se parece a un camino interminable que atraviesa la galaxia misma. No veo en él un principio ni un final...». {n}Yrliet hace una pausa para mirarte con atención.{/n} «Pero sí diviso dónde termina el camino para ti, {name}. Y termina mucho antes que el mío; es como un destello fugaz, el centelleo de una estrella distante. Un momento breve y hermoso... Y este camino, este momento, deseo compartirlo contigo. Tanto tiempo como me permitan las estrellas. Y no como {mf|un humano|una humana} y una hija de Asuryan, sino como iguales. {name} e Yrliet. Yrliet y {name}. ¿Qué me dices?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Mon monde ressemble à une route sans fin, transperçant la galaxie. Je n'en perçois ni le début ni la fin... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant et vous observe attentivement.{/n} « Mais je vois où votre route s'arrête, {name}. Elle s'interrompt bien avant la mienne, comme un éclat de lumière ou le scintillement d'une étoile filante. Un instant à la fois fugace et magnifique... Et cette route, cet instant, je souhaite les partager avec vous, non pas comme {mf|un humain|une humaine} et une enfant d'Asuryan, mais comme des {mf|égaux|égales}. {name} et Yrliet. Yrliet et {name}. Qu'en dites-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see no beginning or end to it..." {n}Yrliet pauses and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"

traits.locale_text: « Mon monde est semblable à une route sans fin qui traverse la galaxie elle-même. Je n'en perçois ni le début ni la fin... » {n}Yrliet s'interrompt un instant et vous observe attentivement.{/n} « Mais je vois où votre route s'arrête, {name}. Elle s'interrompt bien avant la mienne, comme un éclat de lumière ou le scintillement d'une étoile filante. Un instant à la fois fugace et magnifique... Et cette route, cet instant, je souhaite les partager avec vous, aussi longtemps que les étoiles me le permettront. Non pas comme {mf|un humain|une humaine} et une enfant d'Asuryan, mais comme des {mf|égaux|égales}. {name} et Yrliet. Yrliet et {name}. Qu'en dites-vous ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Welt gleicht einer endlosen Straße, die die Galaxie selbst durchzieht. Ich kann weder Anfang noch Ende sehen ..." {n}Yrliet hält inne und blickt dich aufmerksam an.{/n} "Aber ich sehe, wo die Straße für Euch endet, {name}. Sie endet früher als meine – wie ein flüchtiger Blitz, das Leuchten eines gefallenen Sterns. Ein kurzer, wunderschöner Augenblick ... Und diese Straße, diesen Augenblick, möchte ich mit Euch verbringen. Nicht wie ein Mensch und ein Kind von Asuryan, sondern als Gleichberechtigte. {name} und Yrliet. Yrliet und {name}. Was sagt Ihr dazu?"
languages.original_text: "My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see no beginning or end to it..." {n}Yrliet pauses and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"

traits.locale_text: "Meine Welt gleicht einer endlosen Straße, die die Galaxie selbst durchzieht. Ich kann weder Anfang noch Ende sehen ..." {n}Yrliet hält inne und blickt dich aufmerksam an.{/n} "Aber ich sehe, wo die Straße für Euch endet, {name}. Sie endet früher als meine – wie ein flüchtiger Blitz, das Leuchten eines gefallenen Sterns. Ein kurzer, wunderschöner Augenblick ... Und diese Straße, diesen Augenblick, möchte ich mit Euch verbringen. Solange die Sterne es mir ermöglichen. Nicht wie ein Mensch und ein Kind von Asuryan, sondern als Gleichberechtigte. {name} und Yrliet. Yrliet und {name}. Was sagt Ihr dazu?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我の世界は、銀河を貫く果てしない道のようなものだ。我には始まりも終わりも見えない…」{n}ユリエットは立ち止まり、注意深くあなたを見つめる。{/n}「しかし、お前にとっての道の終わりは見えるのだ、{name}。それは我よりもはるかに早く終わる。はかない閃光のように、落ちた星のきらめきのように。はかなくも美しい瞬間…そしてこの道、この瞬間を、我はお前と過ごしたい。人間とアシュリアンの御子としてではなく、対等な関係として。{name}とユリエット、ユリエットと{name}。どう思う？」
languages.original_text: "My world resembles an endless road, piercing the galaxy itself. I can see no beginning or end to it..." {n}Yrliet pauses and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"

traits.locale_text: 「我の世界は、銀河を貫く果てしない道のようなものだ。我には始まりも終わりも見えない…」{n}ユリエットは立ち止まり、注意深くあなたを見つめる。{/n}「しかし、お前にとっての道の終わりは見えるのだ、{name}。それは我よりもはるかに早く終わる。はかない閃光のように、落ちた星のきらめきのように。はかなくも美しい瞬間…そしてこの道、この瞬間を、我はお前と過ごしたい。人間とアシュリアンの御子としてではなく、対等な関係として。{name}とユリエット、ユリエットと{name}。どう思う？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

I can see no beginning or end to it..." {n}Yrliet pauses and looks at you attentively.{/n} "But I can see where the road ends for you, . It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment... And this road, this moment, I wish to spend with you. Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals.  and Yrliet. Yrliet and . What do you say?"

languages.text: "Dünyam galaksiyi delip geçen sonsuz bir yola benziyor. Ne başını ne de sonunu görebiliyorum..." {n}Yrliet, duraksayıp sana dikkatle bakıyor.{/n} "Fakat yolun senin için nerede bittiğini görüyorum {name}. Senin yolun, benden çok daha erken bitiyor. Uçup giden bir an, kayan bir yıldızın pırıltısı gibi. Kısa ama güzel bir an... Bu yolu, bu anı seninle geçirmek istiyorum. Birer insan ve Asuryan'ın Çocuğu olarak değil, akran olarak. {name} ve Yrliet. Yrliet ve {name}. Ne dersin?"

Not as a human and a Child of Asuryan, but as equals. {name} and Yrliet. Yrliet and {name}. What do you say?"

Senin yolun, benden çok daha erken bitiyor. Uçup giden bir an, kayan bir yıldızın pırıltısı gibi. Kısa ama güzel bir an... Bu yolu, bu anı seninle geçirmek istiyorum.
